title: My vocal range is F3-A5, is this good? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well as you may know this is a very popular US designation, not so popular in the rest of the world. An octave begins at A and spans to the next upper G; despite the undue reference to C. So your range is only one octave and two tones. A minimum of up to two octaves would be best.
You have a mezzo soprano voice… yes that is good. You have a 2.4 octave range. Most pop singers are mezzo sopranos
